name: Scroll View Interceptor
description: Middle-click drag scroll interceptor for desktop/web.

use: you want middle-mouse drag scrolling on desktop/web.
you need a wrapper that can be toggled on/off.

patterns.title: Toggle interception
patterns.code:
ScrollViewInterceptor(
  enabled: isDesktopMode,
  child: ListView.builder(
    itemCount: 50,
    itemBuilder: (_, index) => Text('Row $index'),
  ),
)

accessibility: Provide alternate scroll controls for keyboard users.
do: Use for desktop/web experiences where middle-click drag is expected.
Allow users to disable the behavior when needed.
dont: Enable by default on touch-only platforms.
